name: Galactic Blaster
description:
The is my modified 2D Shooter Project for my class CAS 117.

I have modified the original 2D shooter to be different than the tutorial.

1. I added music to each level and the main menu. Also the level win sound is different.

2. I made an entire level 3 to the game.

3. The main menu and all the levels have a different background, different amounts of enemies, and the enemies/player has different movement speeds and shooting speeds for each level. 

4. The level select buttons are spaced out evenly and there is now instructions and movement descriptions. 

5. The name for the game is now Galactic Blaster.

Credits:

Created by Andrew Jamison

https://freesound.org.
